properties.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 3:29PM CST until January 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected.

* WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and
Calhoun Islands Counties.

* WHEN...From noon to 9 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Poor driving conditions are expected as water
reaches the dunes, mainly near times of high tide. Some beach
access roads will be impassable. High water levels will also
approach low areas along the intracoastal waterways and bays.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY
